EmailTemplate.name: SD_Sheff_Cakes
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us for Sheffield Meet the Team Tea and Cakes, 3rd August
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},Come along on the 3rd of August and meet your local Supply Desk Sheffield team, we’re a super friendly bunch! You can find out more about the opportunities available in the area and all the benefits of registering with us, including:
Competitive rates Wide choice of schools and opportunities Continued Professional Development courses available Generous Refer a Friend programme – £100 paid for every successful referral
Where: Sir Wilfred Newton House, 2nd Floor, Thorncliffe Park, Chapeltown, S35 2PH
When: Friday 3rd August, 10am – 1pm
RSVP: To register for the event contact the team on 0114 272 5535 or email sheffield@supplydesk.co.uk
Kind Regards,
Supply Desk Sheffield
